headline: BMY Up 7.6% Post Q4 Earnings: Should You Buy, Sell or Hold the Stock?
summary: BMY jumps after strong Q4 2025 results as its growth portfolio drives beats, lifts sentiment and offsets generic pressure on legacy drugs.

headline: Guggenheim Raises its Price Target on Bristol-Myers Squibb Company (BMY) to $72 and Reiterates a Buy Rating
summary: Bristol-Myers Squibb Company (NYSE:BMY) is included among the 10 Most Profitable Undervalued Stocks to Buy On February 6, 2026, Guggenheim raised its price target on Bristol-Myers Squibb Company (NYSE:BMY) to $72 from $62 and reiterated a Buy rating. The firm significantly increased its estimated probability of success for iber/mezi to 90% from 33% and lifted its […]

headline: Evinova and Bristol Myers Squibb Forge Strategic Collaboration to Optimize Clinical Development with Artificial Intelligence
